Zero has kidnapped nine people and placed them in a warehouse to play the deadly Nonary Game. These seemingly nine strangers have bracelets that will kill them if they donâ€™t play the game correctly. However, how can they trust each other, and do some have ulterior motives? With fully voiced dual language support, mind-bending puzzles and more, solve the mystery that is Zero!
